name: Linear
description: Linear 1D function y = (ax + b) +|* Values0, x is an array of integers from 0 to nbPoints.

inputs.name: nbPoints
inputs.description: Number of output points (should match initialization params nbPointsInLayer for radiusShapingParameter or nbLayers for all other shaping parameters.)

inputs.name: values0
inputs.description: (optional) Array of floats added to or multiplied by the function.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: (optional) ‘aditive’ (default) or ‘multiplicative’ – mode determines if function operation is added to previous values or multiplied by previous values
